page.title: 12OLD and YOUNG of PENICUIK
page.content: In our area we have{Cuikenburn Nursery {School}for pre-school children and {Pentland House}for old people. {Cuikenburn Nursery School It was opened in 1980. The{head {teacher}is Mrs.Renton and there is {one other teacher and 4 nursery {nurses.}There are{120 children,}some going in the morning, some in the afternoon. They pay 15p a week for fruit and snacks. Buffy,the{rabbit,and Pepsi,the{guinea pig,}stay at the nursery.The children have lots of things to play with.Outside there is a climbing frame,boxes and tyres and a garden. Inside there is a dressing up corner,baking area,clay and paints,sand,water and a work bench. The children seem to enjoy them selfs.There is a waiting list for places.
